original_text: Abram settled in the land of Canaan, while Lot settled among the cities of the valley and moved his tent as far as Sodom.
korean_text: 아브람은 가나안 땅에 거주하였고 롯은 그 지역의 도시들에 머무르며 그 장막을 옮겨 소돔까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: Abram settled in the land of Canaan
while Lot settled among the cities of the valley
sentences.korean_translation: 한편 롯은 골짜기 성읍들 가운데 정착했습니다.

sentences.original_text: and moved his tent as far as Sodom.
